textBox.richText: The new section of my site is finished! As you might have noticed, there is now a homepage to my site which has links to access this blog as well as the new science section where I will be describing my current projects and the like! You can quick–access this new section through the URL science.mylifeisdoyle.com This site is finally being expanded after three years! Hooray! Be on the lookout for when I finally get around to writing about all my scientific undertakings.
